name: Bolide
description:
The largest meteor shower humankind has ever seen is rapidly approaching Earth. Take control of the latest planetary defence systems to save the human race! Utilise two high powered cannons, a plasma shield and a mining drone to gather valuable resources in order to upgrade your systems as the threat continues to grow.

Controls


Left Analog stick - Rotate left turret
Right Analog stick - Rotate right turret
LT - Shoot left Turret
RT - Shoot Right Turret
LB/RB - Move Planetarty shield
A - Sends out drone
B - Recalls drone
Y - Activate radar
